LandingPage.headline: Tackling Food Waste One Bite at a Time
LandingPage.description: SaveBite helps supermarkets reduce food waste through smart inventory tracking, real-time expiration alerts, and streamlined food donation tools.
LandingPage.We are dedicated to minimizing food wast: We are dedicated to minimizing food waste in supermarkets by providing tools to track inventory, monitor expiration dates, and ensure that surplus food is repurposed or donated to those in need.
LandingPage.Our goal is to support community welfare: Our goal is to support community welfare and promote sustainable consumption in line with SDG Goal 12.
LandingPage.Get a clear overview of all products in: Get a clear overview of all products in stock and their shelf life.
LandingPage.Receive instant alerts for items nearing: Receive instant alerts for items nearing their expiration dates to take early action.
LandingPage.Discover creative recipe ideas for items: Discover creative recipe ideas for items nearing expiration â€” instantly suggested by our smart chatbot.
LandingPage.Access insights on waste trends and make: Access insights on waste trends and make better restocking decisions.
LandingPage.Donate surplus food directly to local ch: Donate surplus food directly to local charities with just a few taps.
LandingPage.How Supermarkets Can Become the Frontlin: How Supermarkets Can Become the Frontline Warriors Against Food Waste.
LandingPage.From Shelves to Shelters: Why Food Donat: From Shelves to Shelters: Why Food Donations Matter More Than Ever.
LandingPage.Smarter Stock, Less Waste: How AI and Ch: Smarter Stock, Less Waste: How AI and Chatbots Are Changing Food Retail.
LandingPage.Food waste isnâ€™t just a household prob: Food waste isnâ€™t just a household problem â€” supermarkets play a massive role in what gets thrown away. This article explores how smarter inventory practices, proactive expiration tracking, and local donation partnerships can empower supermarkets to lead the fight against food waste. Learn how technology like SaveBite transforms daily operations into sustainable solutions.
LandingPage.Every day, tons of edible food are disca: Every day, tons of edible food are discarded while communities nearby go hungry. This post highlights the impact of food donations, breaks down the logistics, and shows how platforms like SaveBite are making it easier than ever for supermarkets to connect with verified charities. Learn how donating surplus isn't just good â€” it's necessary.
LandingPage.Artificial intelligence is no longer jus: Artificial intelligence is no longer just a buzzword â€” itâ€™s changing how food businesses operate. In this article, we explore how SaveBiteâ€™s AI-powered chatbot helps reuse items nearing expiration by suggesting quick recipes, and how analytics can forecast demand to reduce overstocking. Smart technology, real savings, and a better planet.
LandingPage.Supermarkets vs Food Waste: Who Holds th: Supermarkets vs Food Waste: Who Holds the Power
LandingPage.Why Food Donations Should Be Part of Eve: Why Food Donations Should Be Part of Every Retail Strategy
LandingPage.How AI is Helping Stores Make Smarter In: How AI is Helping Stores Make Smarter Inventory Decisions

Dashboard.message: Easily import your product data to streamline your workflow. Make sure the file includes accurate details for each product, such as name, category, unit price, stock levels, reorder points, and sales figures. This feature allows you to quickly upload comprehensive data for efficient tracking of stock and performance. Ensure all fields are properly formatted to maintain accuracy and consistency.

Analytics.Measures how quickly inventory is sold a: Measures how quickly inventory is sold and replenished
Analytics.Evaluates how well restocking aligns wit: Evaluates how well restocking aligns with demand
Analytics.Measures how much waste is generated per: Measures how much waste is generated per dollar of sales

tracking.message: Add the items youâ€™ve recently bought to keep track of when they expire, This helps you reduce food waste, save money, and plan smarter meals, Keeping an eye on expiration dates means fewer forgotten items at the back of the fridge, fewer surprise spoilages, and more intentional grocery habits.
tracking.label: Label
tracking.uploadProduct: Upload product image to extract expiration dates from it.
tracking.datesExtracted: If the dates are extracted right click save or edit it manually if you want.
tracking.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
tracking.modify: Modify your product details and update expiration dates.
tracking.editTheDates: Edit the dates or save them if extracted correctly.
tracking.clickUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
tracking.maxSize: Max 10mb file size, only png or .jpeg files.

community.misrElKheirDescription: A national charity targeting hunger, education, and healthcare. Our food security branch distributes staple ingredients and clean water supplies to rural families in Upper Egypt.
community.amalCharityDescription: Al Amal focuses on serving remote villages by coordinating monthly food deliveries. Your donations help us reduce malnutrition in areas with little government support.
community.takafulFoundationDescription: We believe in sustainability and zero waste. Takaful takes surplus food from markets and restaurants, ensuring it reaches orphanages and elderly homes while still fresh and usable.
